mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM open_chat_rooms WHERE open_chat_rooms.manager_id = #{managerId} AND open_chat_rooms.deleted_time is null LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO open_chat_rooms (manager_id, title, notice, category_id, maximumCapacity, password) VALUES (#{managerId}, #{title}, #{notice}, #{categoryId}, #{maximumCapacity}, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE open_chat_rooms SET current_capacity = current_capacity + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_time is null
